39 bool lib_compar(const std::pair<float, int>& a,
40  const std::pair<float, int>& b) {
41  return (a.first < b.first);

52 enum Rotation { No, Householder, Random };

58 template<class DivisionSpace>
59 class Random_kd_forest {
60  typedef typename DivisionSpace::FT FT;
61 #ifdef RKD_WITH_BOOST
62 
65  typedef typename Division_Euclidean_space<FT>::Graph Graph;
69  typedef typename Division_Euclidean_space<FT>::vertex_t vertex_t;
70 #endif

72  private:
73 #ifdef RKD_PAR
74 
85  void populate(std::vector<RKD <DivisionSpace> >* roots, const int from, const int to,
86  const DivisionSpace* ds, size_t* split_dims, int t) {
87  //std::cout << "from = " << from << ", to = " << to << "\n";
88  try {
89 
90  std::vector<size_t> indices;
91  indices.reserve(ds->size());
92 
93  for (size_t i = 0; i < ds->size(); ++i) {
94  indices.push_back(i);
95  }
96  // using a local lock_guard to lock mtx guarantees unlocking on destruction / exception:
97  //std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck (mtx);
98  for(int i = from; i < to; ++i) {
99  (*roots)[i].build(0, indices.begin(), indices.end(), split_dims, t, ds->dim());
100  }
101  }
102  catch (const std::bad_alloc&) {
103  std::cout << "[exception caught when constructing tree]\n";
104  return;
105  }
106  }
107 #endif
108 
109  public:
110 
123  Random_kd_forest(DivisionSpace & ds, const int sample = 100,
124  size_t points_per_leaf = 1, const int trees_no = 5, int t = 5,
125  Rotation rotate_option = No) {
126 
127  /***** Compute number of leaves, nodes and maximum number of points per leaf.*****/
128  size_t leaves = (ds.size() / points_per_leaf)
129  + !!(ds.size() % points_per_leaf); // Add one if nonzero remainder
130  /*
131  leaves = ( forest->points.size() / points_per_leaf )
132  + ( dataset->points % perleaf > 0) ? 1 : 0;
133  */
134 
135  // If 'leaves' is a power of two, (leaves & (leaves - 1)) is zero.
136  if (leaves & (leaves - 1)) {
137  // Not a power of two. Round up.
138  size_t old;
139 
140  // Fill all low bits
141  do {
142  old = leaves;
143  leaves |= leaves >> 1;
144  } while (old != leaves);
145 
146  // Add one
147  leaves++;
148  }
149 
150  size_t nmax = ds.size() / leaves + !!(ds.size() % leaves); // +1 if remainder nonzero
151 
152  // There are one less nodes than (the power of two) number of leaves
153  size_t nodes = leaves - 1;
154 
155  /************************** Done *****************************************/
156 
157  //std::cout << "nodes = " << nodes << ", nmax = " << nmax
158  //<< ", leaves = " << leaves << ", total points = " << points.size() << "\n";
159  if (rotate_option == Householder) {
160  DivisionSpace rot_dataset(ds.size(), ds.dim());
161  // vector used by rotation process
162  std::vector<float> v;
163 
164  rotate(ds.size(), ds.dim(), rot_dataset, ds.getPoints(), v);
165 
166  float avg[ds.dim()];
167  float var[ds.dim()];
168 
169  size_t split_dims[t];
170 
171  compute_variances<FT>(t, ds.getPoints(), ds.dim(), ds.size(), avg, var,
172  split_dims, sample);
173 
174 #ifdef RKD_PAR
175  for (int i = 0; i < trees_no; ++i) {
176  roots.push_back(
177  RKD<DivisionSpace>(&rot_dataset, nodes, leaves, nmax, &v, &ds));
178  }
179  /*
180  * If your vector has n elements and you have p threads,
181  * thread i writes only to elements [i n / p, (i + 1) n / p).
182  * Note that this is preferable over having thread i write to
183  * elements at index j only if j mod p = i because it leads to
184  * fewer cache invalidations.
185  */
186  int p;
187  #if __GNUC__ >= 5 || __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 8 // 4.8 for example
188  const int P = std::thread::hardware_concurrency();
189  p = (trees_no < P) ? trees_no : P;
190  //std::cout << P << " concurrent threads are supported.\n";
191  #else
192  const int P = my_hardware_concurrency();
193  p = (trees_no < P) ? trees_no : P;
194  //std::cout << P << " concurrent threads are supported.\n";
195  #endif
196  if(!p) {
197  std::cout << "ERROR: 'p' is zero.\n";
198  return;
199  }
200  const int chunk = trees_no / p;
201 
202  std::thread threads[p];
203  // spawn 'p' threads:
204  threads[p - 1] = std::thread(&Random_kd_forest::populate, this, &roots, (p - 1) * chunk, trees_no,
205  &rot_dataset, &split_dims[0], t);
206  for (int i = 0; i < p - 1; ++i)
207  threads[i] = std::thread(&Random_kd_forest::populate, this, &roots, i * chunk, (i + 1) * chunk,
208  &rot_dataset, &split_dims[0], t);
209 
210  for (int i = 0; i < p; ++i)
211  threads[i].join();
212 #else // serial construction of trees
213  for (int i = 0; i < trees_no; ++i) {
214  roots.push_back(
215  RKD<DivisionSpace>(&rot_dataset, nodes, leaves, nmax, &v, &ds));
216  std::vector<size_t> indices;
217  indices.reserve(ds.size());
218 
219  for (size_t i = 0; i < ds.size(); ++i) {
220  indices.push_back(i);
221  }
222  roots[i].build(0, indices.begin(), indices.end(), split_dims, t, ds.dim());
223  }
224 #endif
225  } else {
226  float avg[ds.dim()];
227  float var[ds.dim()];
228 
229  size_t split_dims[t];
230 
231  compute_variances<FT>(t, ds.getPoints(), ds.dim(), ds.size(), avg, var,
232  split_dims, sample);
233 
234 #ifdef RKD_PAR
235  for (int i = 0; i < trees_no; ++i) {
236  roots.push_back(
237  RKD<DivisionSpace>(&ds, nodes, leaves, nmax, nullptr, nullptr));
238  }
239  /*
240  * If your vector has n elements and you have p threads,
241  * thread i writes only to elements [i n / p, (i + 1) n / p).
242  * Note that this is preferable over having thread i write to
243  * elements at index j only if j mod p = i because it leads to
244  * fewer cache invalidations.
245  */
246  int p;
247  #if __GNUC__ >= 5 || __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 8 // 4.8 for example
248  const int P = std::thread::hardware_concurrency();
249  p = (trees_no < P) ? trees_no : P;
250  //std::cout << P << " concurrent threads are supported.\n";
251  #else
252  const int P = my_hardware_concurrency();
253  p = (trees_no < P) ? trees_no : P;
254  //std::cout << P << " concurrent threads are supported.\n";
255  #endif
256  if(!p) {
257  std::cout << "ERROR: 'p' is zero.\n";
258  return;
259  }
260  const int chunk = trees_no / p;
261 
262  std::thread threads[p];
263  // spawn 'p' threads:
264  threads[p - 1] = std::thread(&Random_kd_forest::populate, this, &roots, (p - 1) * chunk, trees_no,
265  &ds, &split_dims[0], t);
266  for (int i = 0; i < p - 1; ++i)
267  threads[i] = std::thread(&Random_kd_forest::populate, this, &roots, i * chunk, (i + 1) * chunk,
268  &ds, &split_dims[0], t);
269 
270  for (int i = 0; i < p; ++i)
271  threads[i].join();
272 #else // serial construction of trees
273  for (int i = 0; i < trees_no; ++i) {
274  roots.push_back(
275  RKD<DivisionSpace>(&ds, nodes, leaves, nmax, nullptr, nullptr));
276  std::vector<size_t> indices;
277  indices.reserve(ds.size());
278 
279  for (size_t i = 0; i < ds.size(); ++i) {
280  indices.push_back(i);
281  }
282  if(rotate_option == Random)
283  std::random_shuffle(indices.begin(), indices.end());
284  roots[i].build(0, indices.begin(), indices.end(), split_dims, t, ds.dim());
285  }
286 #endif
287  }
288  }
289 
319  void search_nn_prune(const std::vector<FT>& q,
320  std::vector<std::pair<float, int> >& res,
321  int max_leaf_check, bool sorted_results = false, int k =
322  1,
323  float epsilon = 0) {
324 
325  float mul_factor = 1 / (1 + epsilon);
326  size_t max_count = max_leaf_check * mul_factor;
327  res.resize(k, { std::numeric_limits<float>::max(), -1 });
328  std::make_heap(res.begin(), res.end());
329  Min_heap branch;
330  std::unordered_set<size_t> vis;
331  for (size_t i = 0; i < roots.size(); ++i) {
332  roots[i].search_nn(q, mul_factor, max_leaf_check, res, branch, 0, 0, i, vis);
333  }
334  //std::cout << "Heap.size " << branch.size() << " \n";
335  size_t c = 0;
336  size_t node_i, tree_i;
337  float new_mindist;
338 
339  while (branch.size() && c++ < max_count) {
340  std::tie(new_mindist, node_i, tree_i) = branch.top();
341  branch.pop();
342  //std::cout << new_mindist << std::endl;
343  roots[tree_i].search_nn(q, mul_factor, max_leaf_check, res, branch,
344  new_mindist, node_i, tree_i, vis);
345  }
346  //std::cout << "Checked " << c << " branches\n";
347  //std::cout << "End Heap.size " << branch.size() << " \n";
348  if (sorted_results)
349  std::sort_heap(res.begin(), res.end());
350  }
351 
352 #ifdef RKD_WITH_BOOST
353 
383  void search_nn_prune(Graph& g, vertex_t& v,
384  std::vector<std::pair<float, int> >& res,
385  int max_leaf_check, bool sorted_results = false, int k =
386  1,
387  float epsilon = 0) {
388 
389  std::vector<FT> q;
390  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < g[v].v.size(); ++i)
391  q.push_back(g[v].v[i]);
392  float mul_factor = 1 / (1 + epsilon);
393  size_t max_count = max_leaf_check * mul_factor;
394  res.resize(k, { std::numeric_limits<float>::max(), -1 });
395  std::make_heap(res.begin(), res.end());
396  Min_heap branch;
397  std::unordered_set<size_t> vis;
398  for (size_t i = 0; i < roots.size(); ++i) {
399  roots[i].search_nn(q, mul_factor, max_leaf_check, res, branch, 0, 0, i, vis);
400  }
401  size_t c = 0;
402  size_t node_i, tree_i;
403  float new_mindist;
404 
405  while (branch.size() && c++ < max_count) {
406  std::tie(new_mindist, node_i, tree_i) = branch.top();
407  branch.pop();
408  roots[tree_i].search_nn(q, mul_factor, max_leaf_check, res, branch,
409  new_mindist, node_i, tree_i, vis);
410  }
411  if (sorted_results)
412  std::sort_heap(res.begin(), res.end());
413  }
414 #endif
415 
447  void search_nn_prune(
448  const size_t N,
449  std::vector<std::vector<std::pair<float, int> > >& res,
450  int max_leaf_check, bool sorted_results, int k = 1, float epsilon = 0) {
451 
452  float mul_factor = 1 / (1 + epsilon);
453  size_t max_count = max_leaf_check * mul_factor;
454  const std::vector<FT>* points = roots[0].get_points();
455  const size_t D = roots[0].dim();
456  res.resize(N);
457 
458  for (size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
459  res[i].resize(k, { std::numeric_limits<float>::max(), -1 });
460  std::make_heap(res[i].begin(), res[i].end());
461  Min_heap branch;
462  std::unordered_set<size_t> vis;
463  int offset = i * D;
464  std::vector<FT> q(points->begin() + offset, points->begin() + offset + D);
465  for (size_t j = 0; j < roots.size(); ++j) {
466  roots[j].search_nn(q, mul_factor, max_leaf_check, res[i], branch, 0, 0,
467  j, vis);
468  }
469  size_t c = 0;
470  size_t node_i, tree_i;
471  float new_mindist;
472 
473  while (branch.size() && c++ < max_count) {
474  std::tie(new_mindist, node_i, tree_i) = branch.top();
475  branch.pop();
476  roots[tree_i].search_nn(q, mul_factor, max_leaf_check, res[i], branch,
477  new_mindist, node_i, tree_i, vis);
478  }
479  if (sorted_results)
480  std::sort_heap(res[i].begin(), res[i].end());
481  }
482  }
483 
513  void search_nn(const std::vector<FT>& q,
514  std::vector<std::pair<float, int> >& res,
515  int max_leaf_check, unsigned int k = 1, float epsilon = 0) {
516  float mul_factor = 1 / (1 + epsilon);
517  std::vector<std::vector<std::pair<float, int> > > v;
518  v.resize(roots.size());
519  std::unordered_set<size_t> visited;
520  for (size_t i = 0; i < roots.size(); ++i) {
521  v[i] = std::vector<std::pair<float, int> > { k, { std::numeric_limits<
522  FT>::max(), -1 } };
523  std::make_heap(v[i].begin(), v[i].end());
524  roots[i].search_nn(q, mul_factor, max_leaf_check, v[i], visited);
525  std::sort_heap(v[i].begin(), v[i].end());
526  }
527 
528  std::vector<std::pair<float, int> > con;
529  con.reserve(roots.size() * k);
530  for (size_t i = 0; i < roots.size(); ++i)
531  con.insert(con.end(), v[i].begin(), v[i].end());
532  std::sort(con.begin(), con.end(), lib_compar);
533 
534  int i = 0;
535  for (int j = 0; j < k; ++i) {
536  if ((std::find(res.begin(), res.end(), con[i])) == res.end()) {
537  res.push_back(con[i]);
538  ++j;
539  }
540  }
541  }

574  void search_nn(Graph& g, vertex_t& v_d,
575  std::vector<std::pair<float, int> >& res,
576  int max_leaf_check, int k = 1, float epsilon = 0) {
577  std::vector<FT> q;
578  for(int i = 0; i < g[v_d].v.size(); ++i)
579  q.push_back(g[v_d].v[i]);
580  float mul_factor = 1 / (1 + epsilon);
581  std::vector<std::vector<std::pair<float, int> > > v;
582  v.resize(roots.size());
583  std::unordered_set<size_t> visited;
584  for (size_t i = 0; i < roots.size(); ++i) {
585  v[i] = std::vector<std::pair<float, int> > { k, { std::numeric_limits<
586  FT>::max(), -1 } };
587  std::make_heap(v[i].begin(), v[i].end());
588  roots[i].search_nn(q, mul_factor, max_leaf_check, v[i], visited);
589  std::sort_heap(v[i].begin(), v[i].end());
590  }
591 
592  std::vector<std::pair<float, int> > con;
593  con.reserve(roots.size() * k);
594  for (size_t i = 0; i < roots.size(); ++i)
595  con.insert(con.end(), v[i].begin(), v[i].end());
596  std::sort(con.begin(), con.end(), lib_compar);
597 
598  int i = 0;
599  for (int j = 0; j < k; ++i) {
600  if ((std::find(res.begin(), res.end(), con[i])) == res.end()) {
601  res.push_back(con[i]);
602  ++j;
603  }
604  }
605  }
606 #endif

632  size_t search_nn_radius(std::vector<FT>& q,
633  std::vector<std::pair<int, float> >& res, float r,
634  float epsilon = 0, int max_leaf_check = 50) {
635 
636  float mul_factor = 1 / (1 + epsilon);
637  std::vector<std::vector<std::pair<int, float> > > v;
638  v.resize(roots.size());
639  std::unordered_set<size_t> visited;
640  for (size_t i = 0; i < roots.size(); ++i) {
641  roots[i].search_nn_radius(q, mul_factor, max_leaf_check, r, v[i], visited);
642  }
643 
644  res.insert(res.end(), v[0].begin(), v[0].end());
645  for (size_t i = 1; i < roots.size(); ++i) {
646  for (size_t j = 0; j < v[i].size(); ++j) {
647  if ((std::find(res.begin(), res.end(), v[i][j])) == res.end()) {
648  res.push_back(v[i][j]);
649  }
650  }
651  }
652  return res.size();
653  }

681  size_t search_nn_radius(Graph& g, vertex_t& v_d,
682  std::vector<std::pair<int, float> >& res, float r,
683  float epsilon = 0, int max_leaf_check = 50) {
684 
685  std::vector<FT> q;
686  for(int i = 0; i < g[v_d].v.size(); ++i)
687  q.push_back(g[v_d].v[i]);
688  float mul_factor = 1 / (1 + epsilon);
689  std::vector<std::vector<std::pair<int, float> > > v;
690  v.resize(roots.size());
691  std::unordered_set<size_t> visited;
692  for (size_t i = 0; i < roots.size(); ++i) {
693  roots[i].search_nn_radius(q, mul_factor, max_leaf_check, r, v[i], visited);
694  }
695 
696  res.insert(res.end(), v[0].begin(), v[0].end());
697  for (size_t i = 1; i < roots.size(); ++i) {
698  for (size_t j = 0; j < v[i].size(); ++j) {
699  if ((std::find(res.begin(), res.end(), v[i][j])) == res.end()) {
700  res.push_back(v[i][j]);
701  }
702  }
703  }
704  return res.size();
705  }

712  void print(const std::vector<FT>& p) {
713  for (size_t i = 0; i < p.size(); ++i)
714  std::cout << p[i] << "\n";

724  void print_trees(bool points = false) {
725  for (size_t i = 0; i < roots.size(); ++i) {
726  roots[i].printNodes();
727  if (points)
728  roots[i].printLeavesPoints();
729  else
730  roots[i].printLeaves();
731  }
732  }
